name: Rummage
description:
In this game occurred a murder. You must discover the place, the killer and the weapon. Exists 8 places, 8 suspects and 8 weapons possibles, these are the 24 cards. Each player receive a unique part of this cards, the objective of the game is discover the 3 cards that was not distributed between the players. You must denounce a combination of cards. The next player need reveal if he has one of this cards. 

Team: Diego Gonçalves, Jhony Lucas, Iago Barreto, Pierre Freire, Aldemir Filho
